qas.question: On which street is a private indoor pedestrian bridge between Amsterdam Avenue and Morningside Drive?
Aove 114th Street is a private pedestrian bridge connecting two buildings from what organization?
A bridge connecting two of St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center's buildings crosses above which road?

context: Above <a0_0><a2_0>114th Street<a2_0/><a0_0/> between Amsterdam Avenue and Morningside Drive, there is a private indoor pedestrian bridge connecting two buildings on the campus of <a1_0>St. Luke's–Roosevelt Hospital Center<a1_0/>.
